hooks.comment: Enhanced hook quote handling - uses jq|tr|xargs pipeline for reliability
hooks.command: cat | jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty' | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 -I {} npx claude-zen@alpha hooks pre-command --command '{}' --validate-safety true --prepare-resources true

hooks.comment: Reliable file path extraction with proper escaping
hooks.command: cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // empty' | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 -I {} npx claude-zen@alpha hooks pre-edit --file '{}' --auto-assign-agents true --load-context true
cat | jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty' | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 -I {} npx claude-zen@alpha hooks post-command --command '{}' --track-metrics true --store-results true

hooks.comment: Post-edit processing with memory storage and formatting
hooks.command: cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // empty' | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 -I {} npx claude-zen@alpha hooks post-edit --file '{}' --format true --update-memory true
npx claude-zen@alpha hooks session-end --generate-summary true --persist-state true --export-metrics true
